definition: he or him/(used for either sex when the sex is unknown or unimportant)/(used before sb's name for emphasis)/(used as a meaningless mock object)/other/another

sentences.english: He shows up in other people and what they say to you.
sentences.chinese: 他以其他人的形式出现，这些人对你说什么？

sentences.english: All these facilities help society reduce the generation gap between the elderly and the others.
sentences.chinese: 这可以协助缩小老人和其他人之间的代沟。

sentences.english: Chinese culture sees all non-Chinese as sub-human, to be exploited.
sentences.chinese: 中国文化把所有的其他人种视为有待剥削的次等民族。

sentences.english: The law punishes people who invade the fights of others.
sentences.chinese: 法律惩罚侵犯他人权利的人。

sentences.english: Women get off on judging each other, especially their very own friends.
sentences.chinese: 女人天性心爱品论他人，特别是评论自己的好朋友。

sentences.english: When you have and hold a need, harken not to others greed.
sentences.chinese: 当你有需求的时候，不要听从他人贪婪的想法。

sentences.english: Respect the elders, love juniors , save all with mercy, care for others.
sentences.chinese: 敬老尊贤，爱护后进，慈悲渡众，关怀他人。

sentences.english: Knowing your own darkness is the most prhvacticing way for deinging with the darknesses of other people.
sentences.chinese: 理解自身的暗淡，是对待他人暗淡一面的最好方法。

sentences.english: The “others” were asleep, while they both breathed the same fever.
sentences.chinese: “他人”都睡熟了，只有他们两个呼吸着同一种热度。

sentences.english: CCS will not be liable for any loss due to any error of the applicant or any other person.
sentences.chinese: 本社对因申请方或他人的过错造成的损失不负责。

sentences.english: Without you deny yourself, think about what other people live.
sentences.chinese: 不要自我否定，想想其他人是怎么过的。

sentences.english: Damon combines his moviemaking talents with his desire to help others.
sentences.chinese: 戴蒙将制作电影的才能和帮助他人的欲望结合在一起。

sentences.english: All the Arsenal staff and everyone else have helped me.
sentences.chinese: 所有的阿森纳工作人员和每一个其他人都在帮助我。

sentences.english: He who would lead must first command himself.
sentences.chinese: 欲领导他人的人必须先统御自己。

sentences.english: But others consider Mr. Welch out of touch.
sentences.chinese: 不过，其他人认为韦尔奇说的不靠谱。

sentences.english: What I perceive as a negative thought may be something natural for somebody else.
sentences.chinese: 我所理解的消极思想可能对其他人来说是自然的。

definition: counterpart/other person involved/opposite side/other side/receiving party
words and actions/what one says and what one does
self/oneself/sixth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/sixth in order/letter "F" or Roman "VI" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/hexa
persons involved or implicated/party (to an affair)
to be of service to others/to help others/benevolent
to put oneself in sb else's shoes (idiom)
